products.title: 24-Hour Replenishing Moisturiser
products.description: A richly hydrating face cream to leave skin feeling replenished and soft. Myrrh, Frankincense and Neroli replenish, while Vitamin E helps protect the skin barrier. Nourishing Evening Primrose and Jojoba also work to deeply moisturise leaving skin silky smooth.

products.title: Tri-Active™ Lift & Firm Moisturiser
products.description: An intensely nourishing hydrator, our Tri-Active Lift &Firm Moisturiser boasts nutrient-rich Marine and Plant Actives for soft, supple, and plumped looking skin. This comforting formula hydrates and nourishes dull, sallow complexions. A rich whipped cream that brings you smooth petal-soft skin boosted with brightness.

products.title: 24-Hour Balancing Moisturiser
products.description: A gentle oil-balancing moisturiser to help hydrate and clarify the skin. White Thyme helps balance and calming Lavender and Chamomile soothe, while nutrient rich plant extracts and Irish Moss moisturise and protect without clogging pores.

products.title: Repair & Restore Intensive Serum
products.description: A potent serum that helps soothe and restore moisture. Wheatgerm helps protect the skin against environmental aggressors. Inca Inchi Oil restores moisture balance while Canola and Wild Indigo protect and soothe, helping boost skin's natural moisture barrier.

products.title: Tri-Active™ Lift & Firm Intensive Serum
products.description: ESPA's Tri-Active™ Lift and Firm Intensive Serum tightens and brightens the skin, super-charged with exclusive Wild Olive. This age-defying concentrate helps visibly restore skin's firmness, elasticity, and bounce - bringing you youthful skin with a radiant lit-from-within glow. Our super serum leaves skin feeling plump and supple.

products.title: Optimal Skin Pro-Serum
products.description: This nutrient-rich, glow-giving serum hydrates and nourishes the skin with supercharged natural actives. Used daily, this intensely revitalising serum helps to nurture and protect skin's natural moisture barrier so that even sensitive skin feels nurtured and emits a healthy-looking radiance.

products.title: Clean & Green Detox Mask
products.description: Restore your radiance and give tired, dull complexions a dose of goodness with this veggie-inspired detox mask. A green smoothie for the skin, this creamy clay formula is packed with plant-based, nutrient-dense greens to help reset skin. Feeling fresh without feeling dry, the greens in this mask are ready to help you glow.

products.title: Clarifying Clay Mineral Mask
products.description: A cleansing, mineral-rich clay mask that helps to balance excess oils, leaving the skin feeling purified and soothed with hydration.   Kaolin Clay and Rose Geranium help clear excess oils, impurities and congestion, Benzoin nourishes, while soothing Rose Damascena and Marshmallow softens and calms.

products.title: Tri-Active™ Regenerating Phyto-Collagen Plumping Mask
products.description: This intensely hydrating mask plumps and smooths, to soften and even the appearance of lines and wrinkles. Discover instant results with this skincare saviour for weary skin. Perfect for night-owls and everyone in need of a skin-refresh, this mask revives lacklustre complexions with rich conditioning properties.

products.title: Detoxifying Salt Scrub
products.description: A deeply cleansing body scrub that refines, smooths and clarifies, for intensely hydrated and replenished skin. Natural Sea Salts sweep away dry, dull skin, Grapefruit, Cypress and Eucalyptus cleanses while Sweet Almond Oil nourishes and hydrates.

products.title: Relaxing Salt Scrub
products.description: A soothing body scrub to nourish, refine and hydrate, leaving skin soft and glowing. Natural Sea Salts sweep away dry, dull skin, Sweet Almond Oil nourishes and hydrates while Bay and Lavender calm the senses.

products.title: Exfoliating Body Polish - Jar
products.description: A cooling and revitalising body scrub to refine, smooth and refresh skin, while helping to boost hydration. Apricot Seed Kernels gently sweep away dry, dull skin, Spearmint cools and refreshes while Aloe Vera hydrates and conditions.

products.title: Smooth & Firm Body Butter
products.description: A rich body butter to help nourish, smooth and tone, leaving skin feeling soft and flexible. Hydrating Larch and Pumpkin Seed Extract help smooth while Rosehip, Argan Oil and Vitamin E moisturise and nourish.

products.title: Bergamot & Jasmine Body Lotion
products.description: A beautifully light body lotion that moisturises, nourishes and softens every day. Infused with a luxurious blend of pure essential oils including Bergamot and Jasmine, to leave the skin delicately fragranced and beautifully soft.

products.title: Cooling Body Moisturiser
products.description: A light cream-gel body moisturiser to instantly soothe and refresh the skin with moisture. Calming Aloe and Ayurvedic Boerhavia gently soothe and hydrate, Hyaluronic Acid and Sunflower Concentrate provide long-lasting moisturisation, while a cooling Menthol complex refreshes the skin.

products.title: Positivity Bath & Body Oil
products.description: Our Signature Blends Bath & Body Oils harness the power of aromatherapy to elevate each moment with sensorial connection. Fragrance blends composed from pure essential oils that complement your moods and indulge the skin. The Positivity Blend features Jasmine, Gardenia, and Rose Geranium to provide a burst of joy, while the vibrancy of Bergamot and Sweet Orange uplift the spirit.

products.title: Connection Bath & Body Oil
products.description: Our Signature Blends Bath & Body Oils harness the power of aromatherapy to elevate each moment with sensorial connection. Fragrance blends composed from pure essential oils that complement your moods and indulge the skin. The Connection Signature Blend features sensual Ylang Ylang, earthy Patchouli, creamy Sandalwood, and soothing Jasmine. These aromatics encourage closeness, intimacy, and communication.

products.title: Restful Bath & Body Oil
products.description: Our Signature Blends Bath & Body Oils harness the power of aromatherapy to elevate each moment with sensorial connection. Fragrance blends composed from pure essential oils that complement your moods and indulge the skin. The Restful Blend harnesses the soporific grace of Lavender, Clary Sage and Eucalyptus for blissful bedtime and a heavenly night's sleep.

services.title: Traditional Thai Massage
services.description: Thai massage has a number of ling term benefits – it can make a real difference to one’s health, mental attitude and well being. Massage increases flexibility, relieves pain and muscle tension, improves blood and lymph circulation, facilitates relaxation and invigorates the nervous system. If performed on regular basis it can help to reduce various ailments and their symptoms.

services.title: Thai massage with herbal balls
services.description: Traditionally the herbal ball is placed on the specific areas after strong, active Thai massage therapy, warming up joints, tightened muscles and other parts of body. Herbal aroma calms, relaxes and reduces the tension, while the heat helps to open pores, refresh the skin, enhance blood circulation and reduce muscle or joint aches.

services.title: Relaxing honey massage
services.description: This is exceptionally soothing and relaxing massage with warm natural honey and oil. Healing qualities of honey are known and appreciated since ancient times. Honey absorbs toxins and helps to remove them from our organism. It also activates blood circulation and warms up the whole body, cleans and nourishes our skin. Honey massage also reduces fatigue, relaxes, calms and leaves the sence of lightness and freshness. Furthermore, it enhances the whole body well-being and resistance to infections.

services.title: Black chocolate massage
services.description: Due to the rich contents of cacao fruits, tempting smell and infatuating taste, chocolate has been known as one of the most pleasant energizers and afrodisiacs for long time now, as well as the undeniable source of beauty and wellness. Used during relaxing and soothing massage, it not only moisturizes, regenerates and softens the skin, but also can cause slimming effect, shape and firm your body lines.

services.title: Stimulating / toning massage
services.description: Stimulating massage helps to recharge after a hard working day, stimulates activity of your organism, reduces fatigue and boosts your daily energy. It suites not only for active sportsmen, also for those, who constantly suffer from physical tension or stress, for those who want to recharge their energy after a big physical charge, intensive trainings, who want to strenghten and relax tired and tensed muscles ant to regain lost power.

services.title: Deep tissue massage
services.description: Strengthening, stimulating and toning, this massage creates a long-term effect, that can be felt in all the body. It releases tensions from muscles, increases their elasticity and body flexibility, takes away fatigue and energizes. For those, who are engaged in sports, it helps to prepare  for trainings better and recover faster after a big physical load, sustain physical shape and tonus.

services.title: Traditional Thai facial treatment
services.description: Traditional Thai facial treatment consists of facial cleansing and natural herbal scrub, Din Saw Pong facial mask and pressure-point facial massage, which not only stimulates blood circulation and reduces wrinkles, but also relaxes and releases tensions from your face.

services.title: Kobido facial massage
services.description: Kobido facial massage with detoxifying green clay scrub is designed for facial skin lacking vitality, glow, contour. Japanese Kobido massage helps to slow down ageing and to improve the skin condition. Fast movements during the treatment activate energy spots, stimulate, tone up and relax facial muscles. Facial skin becomes firmer, the facial contour more distinctive, wrinkles are reduced.

services.title: Facial treatment 'Buddha gold'
services.description: Glowing gold particles create an excellent deffence layer, protecting from harmful external influences, strengthening the skin’s immunity and it’s resistance. In addition to this, gold slows down desintegration of callogen and elastin, firms and smoothens facial skin, protects it from becoming flabby, enhance it’s softness, elasticity, youthfulness and glow. Facial treatment “Buddha Gold” perfectly suits for mature, dry, dull and irritated facial skin.

services.title: Dream of Thailand
services.description: SPA package „Dream of Thailand“ – it is a great opportunity not only to stay in an exclusive environment, but also to enjoy the pleasures of spa together. This SPA package will not only give you good emotions but also will make you feel better physically.

services.title: Secrets of Royal Rest
services.description: This SPA set will be enjoyed by those who crave a longer and even more relaxing SPA ritual. During the ritual, you will enjoy luxurious cosmetics, soothing aromas and perfectly balanced procedures that will immerse you in a real oasis of peace. This rest will be appreciated by your body, mind, and soul. Discover the secrets of the Royal Rest, a rest that everyone definitely desires and deserves.

services.title: Aphrodite’s Magic
services.description: Pearls have long been considered one of the most precious elixirs of youth. The luxurious pearl body scrub is enriched with minerals from the underwater world, precious salts and the iridescent pearlescent shine of iridescent pearls. Luxurious jojoba and almond oils, supplemented with natural skin-protecting components, valuable unsaturated fatty acids and moisturizers, stimulate the synthesis of collagen and elastin, making it an excellent anti-aging agent.

services.title: Pleasant relaxation
services.description: Spa package „Pleasant relaxation“ is a balanced ritual of procedures for those who want to enjoy the spa pleasures for longer and receive full benefit of it.
